short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will replace all mentions of Trump's name with your selected word or phrase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add this app to your Chrome browser and replace all instances of "Trump" with a word or phrase of your choice! Just click the plugin icon in the top of your browser and enter in a new value.
